summary: When a prominent official is murdered at a banquet honoring Charle Chan, the detective and son Lee team up to expose an opium-smuggling ring.
cast: Warner Oland|Irene Hervey|Jon Hall|Russell Hicks|Keye Luke|Halliwell Hobbes|Frederick Vogeding|Neil Fitzgerald|Max Wagner|Lynn Bari|Luke Chan|Jack Chefe|Frank Darien|Harrison Greene|Charles Haefeli|Eddie Hart|Russell Hopton|Gladden James|Colin Kenny|Eddie Lee|James B. Leong|Tony Merlo|Torben Meyer|Moy Ming|Pat O'Malley|Jimmy Phillips|Regina Rambeau|Pat Somerset|Harry Strang|Phil Tead|Sammee Tong|David Torrence|Guy Usher|Beal Wong|Jehim Wong|Walter Wong|Joan Woodbury
title: Charlie Chan in Shanghai
